thread.title: This Tween Wrote An Essay About His Older Sister And Gay Rights And People Are So Touched - BuzzFeed News

author: Remy Smidt
title: This Tween Wrote An Essay About His Older Sister And Gay Rights And People Are So Touched - BuzzFeed News
text:
“I felt really touched,” said Juliana. “It was extremely heartwarming because he has never actually talked about it with me or told me what he thinks about it or how he feels about it.” ID: 10720908 10. A . View this image › 
Juliana Gant ID: 10714501 Check out more articles on BuzzFeed.com! 
Remy Smidt is a social news fellow with BuzzFeed News and is based in New York. Contact Remy Smidt at remy.smidt@buzzfeed.com . Got a confidential tip? Submit it here .
